artist: Totoya Hokkei; Author: Poem by Shun'yūtei Umeaki
creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
medium: Woodblock print (surimono), ink and color on paper
portfolio: Untitled series of the Three Gods of Japanese Poetry
text: The complete series, forming a triptych: P.75.51.19 (R), P.75.51.21 (C), P.75.51.20 (L). Border was added later and stained.
title: Sumiyoshi
